output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF11240017" which indicates this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram with significant reach (25,000-29,999 impressions)
4. Electoral objective: Yes, while subtle, it promotes Marcel Ciolacu's government achievements and uses the campaign slogan "#caleasigurapentruromania"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a campaign activity report with promotional intent
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message highlighting achievements
The post describes a door-to-door campaign visit, promoting government achievements under Marcel Ciolacu's leadership. While it could be argued this is about his role as Prime Minister, the presence of the CMF number and campaign hashtag clearly positions this as electoral content.
The timing and continued promotion of this content after the end of the presidential campaign period makes this problematic.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Promotes achievements under Ciolacu's leadership - Uses campaign hashtag - Is a paid advertisement reaching large audience - Continues to run after campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea difuzarii de materiale de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 792635229631100) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promovat contine numar CMF11240017, promoveaza realizarile guvernamentale ale candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, foloseste hashtag-ul de campanie "#caleasigurapentruromania" si continua sa fie difuzat ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, targetand un public de 25.000-29.999 persoane, cu un buget de 200-299 RON. Efectul electoral este evident prin asocierea pozitiva a candidatului cu reusitele programelor guvernamentale si folosirea elementelor specifice de campanie.
